name: Untitled Spaceship Game Thingy
description:
This was one of my first games I've ever developed. My brother and I developed this in Game Maker Studio back in 2016 and it was a gift for mother's day. I thought it would be a waste to just have it sitting around on my desktop so why not publish it right? Fun fact: "Dia das mães"(the file's name) means "Mother's Day" in Portuguese.

Mateus Mori Ikezaki: Programming and Pixel Art

Gabriel Mori Ikezaki: Pixel Art
